Line1.EDCC1: I’m sorry Sorga, but I’m not sending anyone again. Be at peace with his body recovered.
Line3.EDC7E: Peace? I wonder if you would feel the same if this were your child.
VoiceDir1.EDCC1: Comforting, but still firm and insistent
VoiceDir3.EDC7E: Outraged. Voiced filled with vitriol and scorn.
VoiceDir7.EDCC1: Sukh sighs and knows Sorga is too grief stricken to see reason. Offers her a tired blessed and then walks off.
